{{disambig-more: '''Mines of Moria''' is a collection of three video games. Two of them are platform games for Windows 3.x and one of them is a Text-Adventure for the MS-DOS.<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/mom-trilogy.html Mines of Moria (trilogy)] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 21 April 2011)</ref>
* [[Mines of Moria II: The Escape Out]]

[[Feagwaith]], a man of [[Gondor]], enters the mines of Moria to find a part of ''[[Mithril]]''.<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/mom.html Mines of Moria] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 21 April 2011)</ref><ref name="El Anillo">[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=GEN&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=9 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 10 (retrieved 21 April 2011)</ref> In the second part of the trilogy he must find the way out of Moria.<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/mom2.html Mines of Moria II: The Escape Out] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 21 April 2011)</ref><ref name="El Anillo"/> The last part doesn't take place in [[Moria]] but covers the travels of Feagwaith back to his homeland, Gondor.<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/mom3.html Mines of Moria 3] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 21 April 2011)</ref><ref name="El Anillo"/>
